name: feydar-monorepo
description: FEY Protocol token deployment monitor - Discord bot, webapp, and Farcaster miniapp

scripts.dev: concurrently -n bot,api,webapp,miniapp -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "pnpm --filter bot dev" "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter webapp dev" "pnpm --filter miniapp dev"
scripts.dev:no-bot: concurrently -n api,webapp,miniapp -c green,yellow,magenta "pnpm --filter api dev" "pnpm --filter webapp dev" "pnpm --filter miniapp dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter bot build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter webapp build && pnpm --filter miniapp build
